title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft command on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, the text does not move as expected.
EB: When executing the ShiftLeft command on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, the text should be indented uniformly, with the tabs converted to spaces. In the given scenario, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the first occurrence of a space character (i.e., the tab should be replaced with spaces). It is also confusing if there is a stray space, as it is unclear why the text won't shift.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a default text editor. 2. Type in the following: <space><tab>some text<tab>some text2. 3. Highlight the two lines and execute the ShiftLeft command. Notice that nothing moves.
